TEXT: Please call Stella.  Ask her to bring these things with her from the store:  Six spoons of fresh snow peas, five thick slabs of blue cheese, and maybe a snack for her brother Bob.  We also need a small plastic snake and a big toy frog for the kids.  She can scoop these things into three red bags, and we will go meet her Wednesday at the train station.

TRANSCRIPTION: p p ɹ iː s k æ s ɛ l ɚ æ s k ɚ h ɚ t ɹ aɪ ð eɪ ð s ɪ ŋ z w eɪ θ h ɚ f ɹ ɔː m ð ə s t ɔː s ɪ k s ɚ s ə b uː n z ʌ v ɹ aɪ s s ə n oʊ p iː z f aɪ v s ŋ s ɪ ŋ k s l aɪ b ɚ f ɔːɹ b l uː t i z æ n d ð ɚ m eɪ b iː ʌ s n aɪ k ɚ f ɔːɹ h ɜː b ɹ æ d ɚ b ɔː b i w eɪ æ n iː m n ð ʌ s m ɔː l p l aɪ s t iː k ɚ s n eɪ k æ n d d b ɪ ɡ t ɑːɹ ɹ ɔː k f ɔːɹ ð ə k iː k k iː s s iː k æ n ə ɡ oʊ s ɡ uː p ð eɪ z s ɪ ŋ z ɪ n t uː s ɹ iː ɹ aɪ d ɚ b aɪ ɡ ɚ z æ n d ð ə w eɪ v eɪ ɡ oʊ m iː t h ɚ w ɪ n s d eɪ æ ð ə ð ə t ɪ n s t eɪ ʃ ə n
